name: Myst: Masterpiece Edition
description:
This script will install "Myst: Masterpiece Edition" GOG edition for ScummVM.
During install please let all options by default.
Thanks to the people who helped us play this game in the best conditions.
notes:
- Multilanguage: you could choose your preferred game language during install between english (default), french, german, polish and spanish.
- Please report issue concerning this script on my Github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/

execute.command: cd "$GAMEDIR"; rm -f -r app commonappdata __redist scummvm __support tmp goggame-1207658818.* language_setup.exe language_setup.ini language_setup.png Launch_MystME.exe source;

content:
custom-name: Myst - Masterpiece Edition - GOG - ScummVM
files:
- inno: http://constexpr.org/innoextract/files/snapshots/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13-linux.tar.xz
- gog: N/A:Select the GOG setup file
game:
  game_id: myst-win-$INPUT_LANG
  path: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/innoextract
    file: inno
- execute:
    args: --extract $gog --output-dir "$GAMEDIR/"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract/innoextract
- input_menu:
    description: 'Choose the game''s language:'
    id: LANG
    options:
    - mohawk: English
    - fr: French
    - de: German
    - pl: Polish
    - es: Spanish
    preselect: mohawk
- execute:
    command: cd "$GAMEDIR"; rm -f -r app commonappdata __redist scummvm __support
      tmp goggame-1207658818.* language_setup.exe language_setup.ini language_setup.png
      Launch_MystME.exe source;
scummvm:
  aspect: true
  fullscreen: true
